title: How do I change binds in a way that the client doesn't like?
body: So ive been playing lots of Kayle as of late and wanted to change self cast from Alt and Spell key (ex: Alt+W to self cast W) to Space and Spell key (ex: Space+W to self cast W). The issue is that the client assumes you want to bind self cast to just space when you press it. How would I go about changing this to the way I want? Thanks for any help you can provide!

replies.body: you could look up the process for binding "attack move" to left click and try to apply the same logic there, might work

The spacebar is originally reserved auto-center back to your champion, and it doesn't look like it's possible to combine spacebar to additional keys for hotkeys.  Some keys are reserved and cannot be altered.  For example, I use Shift+2 to self-cast Kayle's W.  While it heals, shift is also the auto attack move so if I'm not careful I could heal and run to my death instead of the opposite direction.  :P  If it helps you, I usually just smart cast over myself for a speed boost.  It's good practice anyway, in case I need to smart cast an ally for some support.  Hope that helps!
